      • updateTableExtensions

        public org.apache.cassandra.config.CFMetaData updateTableExtensions​(org.apache.cassandra.schema.KeyspaceMetadata ksm,
                                                                    org.apache.cassandra.config.CFMetaData cfm,
                                                                    java.util.Collection<IndexMetaData> siblings)
        Update table extensions when index settings change. This allow to get index settings+mappings in the CQL backup of the table.

      • updateTableSchema

        public org.apache.cassandra.schema.KeyspaceMetadata updateTableSchema​(org.apache.cassandra.schema.KeyspaceMetadata ksm2,
                                                                      java.lang.String type,
                                                                      java.util.Map<Index,​org.apache.cassandra.utils.Pair<IndexMetaData,​MapperService>> indiceMap,
                                                                      java.util.Collection<org.apache.cassandra.db.Mutation> mutations,
                                                                      java.util.Collection<org.apache.cassandra.transport.Event.SchemaChange> events)
        Create table for all IndexMetaData having a mapping. WARNING: schema mutations are applied in a random order and table extensions is replace by the last one.
